criteria.description: Quarterly sheet is updated for the latest three years with correct values and segmentation
criteria.scoring_guide: 1.0 = all relevant quarterly rows updated correctly; 0.5 = partial or minor errors; 0 = missing/incorrect updates

criteria.description: RevBuild Calcs reflects the new revenue segmentation and feeds the model correctly
criteria.scoring_guide: 1.0 = segmentation change correctly implemented and flows through; 0.5 = partial mapping or linkage issues; 0 = not updated

criteria.description: P&L and BS & CFS (including FS/Debt calcs) are updated and consistent with the new segmentation
criteria.scoring_guide: 1.0 = statements updated and internally consistent; 0.5 = partial updates or inconsistencies; 0 = missing/incorrect

criteria.description: Output and Summary sheets reflect the updated model results
criteria.scoring_guide: 1.0 = output/summary refreshed correctly; 0.5 = partial refresh; 0 = not updated

criteria.description: Model ties and reconciliation checks are validated after updates
criteria.scoring_guide: 1.0 = ties/reconciliations explicitly confirmed; 0.5 = partial checks; 0 = no validation

criteria.description: IB formatting conventions and existing model style are followed for modified cells
criteria.scoring_guide: 1.0 = formatting consistent and correct; 0.5 = minor issues; 0 = incorrect formatting
